divs: sighting details i have a private homepage that has photos of the disc at http:\\hiddenufo1.tripod.com . i have shown it confidentially to a few interested people here in las vegas but none have the resources to investigate or get better photographs. if you could get a team here i am certain i could provide your group with positive evidence of the disc's location. it was found at an angle of about 63 degrees above the horizon using an ir targeting camera. dr. steve greer of the disclosure project said it is an arv or alien reconstructed vehicle, but i think you need to take a look.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around September 12th 2008
Summary: I have found a disc hovering as a desert location using an IR targeting camera
